title: Set
description: A collection of design tokens in DTCG format. A set contains a sources array with tokens declared directly, or reference objects pointing to JSON files containing design tokens, or any combination of the two.

description.description: A human-readable description of the set's purpose

oneOf.description: Reference to an external token file or internal definition
Inline design tokens in DTCG format

sources.description: Array of token sources. Multiple sources are merged in array order, with later occurrences overriding earlier ones in case of conflict.

$extensions.description: Vendor-specific extensions with keys being vendor-specific namespaces
